channel.title: Editing shop prices
channel.description: How can i edit shop prices i have looked all over. in most of my files and everything can anyone help?

a fucking tutorial
how brilliant is that?[/quote]
Google sucks shit, try this http://searchrsps.netne.net/
a custom made google for rsps.

If not u goto ur item.Cfg and change the item prices there
in order it goes
ID – Name – Examine — Shopvaule – Low alch — High alch – blah blah blah
1 here look_at_this 20 10 20 0 0 0

item.title: Editing shop prices
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

@the hunt - Thank you helping me with my client problem, but I’m sure you and I both had trouble with changing the pirces at first. This is the help section, and if we help them then they’ll remember it in the future, and possibly help other new members.

To change the price open item.cfg, and find the item. Then change the first 3 numbers to whatever price you desire.

Read full topic
